TopicTitle: Explain that to the insurance agency

Articles.Content:
Imagine that there is a Kerbal insurance agency, what this game is all about is explaining stuff to them in a way that might possibly convince them give you insurance money despite it totally being your fault. How it works is you put a reply from the insurence agency to the last poster's explenation, then you put how you would explain the scenario specified by the last poster, and then give a scenario for the next poster. Here are some examples:

I have color coated the statements so statements that refer to the same scenario and the scenario that they refer to are the same color. You don't need to use colors in your posts.

Poster 1:

[Reply here]

[Explanation here]

Your Mun lander breaks a landing leg when it lands.

Poster 2:

[Reply here]

I spilled mustard on the altimeter, so I couldn't see what it said.

Your space plane breaks a wing while taking off.

Poster 3:

Yes, we will cover that.

The safety inspector was on vacation.

The Kuriosity rover breaks a wheel.

Poster 4:

And you didn't hire a substitute safety officer? We are not covering that.

Jeb somehow got into the control room and tried to jump the rover and set a new Duna land speed record.

[scenario here]

Ect...

Remember to follow all forum rules.

I will start:
